price: Reci: “Ja se samo Gospodaru svome molim i nikoga Njemu u obožavanju ne pridružujem.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
